column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR TATES CREEK RD:
column4: The roadway is shutdown in both directions between Hart Rd and Cochran Rd due to an injury collision resulting in a damaged electric pole and wires.
Leestown Rd at Chestnut Ridge Dr.
E Fourth St at Shropshire Ave.
Outbound Harrodsburg Rd at Overlake Blvd.
Outbound S Broadway just past W High St
Todds Rd at N Cleveland Rd.
Lane Allen Rd at Beacon Hill Rd
column5: Expect one lane to be blocked for emergency water main repair.
